title: Deploy L1 contract error
body:
Follow https://stack.optimism.io/docs/build/getting-started/#deploy-the-l1-contracts,
when run `forge script scripts/Deploy.s.sol:Deploy --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY --broadcast --rpc-url $ETH_RPC_URL
`, got error. 

Details below:

```
root@block:/data/optimism/packages/contracts-bedrock# forge script scripts/Deploy.s.sol:Deploy --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY --broadcast --rpc-url $ETH_RPC_URL
[⠘] Compiling...
No files changed, compilation skipped
Traces:
  [44567491] → new Deploy@0x5b73C5498c1E3b4dbA84de0F1833c4a029d90519
    └─ ← 221938 bytes of code

  [4345770] Deploy::setUp()
    ├─ [0] VM::projectRoot() [staticcall]
    │   └─ ← /data/optimism/packages/contracts-bedrock

    │   └─ ← <env var value>

    │   └─ ← <env var value>
    ├─ [0] VM::envOr(SIG, run)
    │   └─ ← <env var value>

    ├─ [0] console::log(Connected to network with chainid %s, 5) [staticcall]
```
